name: One Click Pony
description:
One Click Pony is a game created by Ben Schiffler, Theo Chin, and Xing Guo for the 2018 Seattle Indies Game Jam. The topic of the game jam was Unexpected Results. The name of the game is simple, click the Pony to win!

Music: potsu and lando! - breakfast
